http.title: Connect to EmptyEpsilon
http.description: Enter the HTTP API address of your EmptyEpsilon server. The server must be started with httpserver=PORT.

data_description.ee_host: IP or hostname of the EE server

ssh.title: SSH (optional)

abort.already_configured: This EE server is already configured.
